data.text: @TheAtlantic @EliotACohen I tried to read this article. We're march 1st. First article I try to read on the Atlantic, and it's blocked, saying I've reached my maximum free articles.. before I read it. What's the maximum, 0?

@TheAtlantic @EliotACohen This story reminds me of The Devilâ€™s Chessboard by David Talbot. The book details Allen Dulles use & exploitation of misguided idealistic American Socialists sent into Postwar Eastern Europe to agitate the USSR. Like RFE exploited the Hungarian Revolution of 1956 to upset Russia.

@TheAtlantic @EliotACohen The Shakespeare quotes & velvet cliches make for a refined opening 

Then the Ad Hominem arguments on Putin. Stick with facts & avoid false logic

Tell the truth ? 
Like when Radio Free Europe lied to Hungary in 1956 promising military support ?

W & Weapons on Mass Destruction ?

@TheAtlantic @EliotACohen Cohen is a warmonger. He lead the group that demanded the Invasion of Iraq to satiate the mad dogs of war desire to expand US hegemony over all the Middle East. The fact that this he has a public & academic venue to spout his "wisdom", proves the hollowness of America.
